    <h2>Home</h2> 
    <!-- Start Sidebar --> 
    <div id="sidebar">

     <!-- com.omniupdate.editor csspath="/z-omniupdate/css/macy-wide.css" cssmenu="" width="992" --> 
     <!-- com.omniupdate.div label="title" group="Everyone" button="734" -->
     <!-- com.omniupdate.editor csspath="/z-omniupdate/css/style.css" cssmenu="/z-omniupdate/css/style.txt" width="700" toolbar="TITLE" --> 
     <!-- /com.omniupdate.div --> 
     <div id="omnicontent"> 
      <!-- com.omniupdate.div label="home-image" group="Everyone" button="727" -->
      <!-- ouc:editor toolbar="IMG_ONLY" csspath="/z-omniupdate/css/style.css" cssmenu="/z-omniupdate/css/style.txt" width="700"/ -->
      <p> <script type="text/javascript">// <![CDATA[
var imgs1 = new Array("/images/bannerroses.png","/images/birdwalkbanner.png","/images/banner.png","/images/desertgardensbanner.jpg","/images/gardenstrees.jpg","/images/eggflowersbanner.jpg","/images/hummingbirdbanner.jpg");
var alt1 = new Array("Rose Garden","Birdwalk","Botanic Garden Banner","Desert Garden","Trees","Egg Flowers","Hummingbird");
var currentAd1 = 0;
var imgCt1 = 7;
function cycle1() {
  if (currentAd1 == imgCt1) {
    currentAd1 = 0;
  }
var banner1 = document.getElementById('Banner1');
var link1 = document.getElementById('adLink1');
  banner1.src=imgs1[currentAd1]
  banner1.alt=alt1[currentAd1]
  currentAd1++;
}
  window.setInterval("cycle1()",8000);
// ]]></script> <img id="Banner1" src="/images/banner.png" border="0" alt="" width="700" height="144" /></p>
      <!-- /com.omniupdate.div --> 
      <!-- com.omniupdate.div label="maincontent" group="Everyone" button="707" -->
      <!-- ouc:editor csspath="/z-omniupdate/css/style.css" cssmenu="/z-omniupdate/css/style.txt" width="700"/ -->
      <h3 style="text-align: center;">Welcome to the University of California Riverside Botanic Gardens</h3> 
      <p style="text-align: center;"><br /><strong style="text-align: center;">Open Daily, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM</strong> --&nbsp; <a style="text-align: center;" href="/information.html" target="_blank">Visitor Information</a></p> 
      <div style="text-align: center;">
       <strong>Follow us On Facebook</strong> &nbsp;
       <a href="https://www.facebook.com/UCRBGfriends" target="_blank"><img src="/images/icon_facebook.png" alt="Facebook icon" width="22" height="22" /></a>
      </div> 
      <div style="text-align: center;">
       &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;
      </div> 
      <div>
       <img style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" src="/images/Logosm.jpg" alt="logo" width="149" height="115" />
      </div> 
      <h4 style="text-align: center;">50th Anniversary, 1963 ~ 2013</h4> 
      <h4 style="text-align: center;"><a style="font-size: 1.25em; line-height: 1.2em;" title="childrens fund" href="/involved/childrensfund.html">Give to the Children's Fund</a></h4> 
      <p>&nbsp;</p> 
      <p><img class="img_L_borderless" src="/images/bgseal.gif" alt="Botanic Gardens seal" width="69" height="69" /></p> 
      <p>Come enjoy the relaxing atmosphere of the UCR Botanic Gardens! Nestled in the foothills of the Box Springs Mountains on the east side of the University of California, Riverside Campus, the Gardens covers 40 hilly acres. Wander over four miles of scenic trails or just relax on a bench and enjoy the beauty.</p> 
      <br /> 
      <div class="figure_L" style="width: 175px;">
       <img style="float: left;" src="/images/aloe2smA.jpg" alt="AloeGarden" width="171" height="138" /> 
       <p>Aloe GardenThe Gardens is a living plant museum with more than 3,500 plant species from around the&nbsp; world for visitors and researchers to see and study. It was established primarily for teaching purposes. In a beautiful setting, the Gardens serves to provide a wide assortment of plant materials for courses at UCR and other local schools.</p> 
      </div> 
      <p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Courses supported include anthropology, art, biology, botany, ecology, entomology, landscape plants, morphology, ornamental horticulture, plant pathology, photography and taxonomy. The Gardens also provides plant materials for various research projects and serves to test and exhibit plant species introduced from all parts of the world. The variable terrain and Riverside's subtropical climate create numerous &quot;microclimates&quot; which allow for the notable diversity of plantings.This wealth of vegetation creates a hospitable sanctuary for wildlife, where nearly 200 bird species have been officially observed.</p> 
      <div class="figure_R" style="width: 180px;">
       <img src="/images/SouthAfCsm.jpg" alt="South African garden" width="180" height="114" /> 
       <p>South African Garden</p> 
      </div> 
      <p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Though maintained separately, the University of California Riverside campus grounds is also considered a part of the Botanic Gardens, and serves to demonstrate landscape plants that do well in Riverside's climate.</p> 
      <p>&nbsp;</p> 
      <img style="float: center;" src="/images/butterfly2a.jpg" alt="butterfly" width="167" height="103" /> 
      <table class="data" style="width: 100%;" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"> 
       <tbody class="striped"> 
        <tr style="text-align: left;"> 
         <td style="text-align: center; background-image: url('/images/border.jpg');" width="50%" valign="middle"> <h4><strong><a href="/involved/friends.html">Become a Friends of the Gardens Member</a></strong></h4> </td> 
         <td style="text-align: center; background-image: url('/images/border.jpg');" valign="middle"> <h4><strong><a href="/involved/volunteer.html">Become a Volunteer</a></strong></h4> </td> 
        </tr> 
       </tbody> 
      </table> 
      <h6 style="padding-left: 240px;">OPEN DAILY FROM 8 AM - 5 PM</h6> 
      <h6 style="padding-left: 280px;"><a href="/directions.html">DIRECTIONS</a></h6>
      <!-- /com.omniupdate.div --> 
      <!-- com.omniupdate.div label="related" group="Everyone" button="707" -->
      <!-- com.omniupdate.editor csspath="/z-omniupdate/css/style.css" cssmenu="/z-omniupdate/css/style.txt" width="300" -->
      <br /> 
      <!-- /com.omniupdate.div -->

     <div class="column49"> 
      <h3>General Campus Information</h3> 
      <address> <span class="vcard"> <strong><span class="fn org">University of California, Riverside</span></strong><br /> <span class="adr"> <span class="street-address">900 University Ave.</span><br /> <span class="locality">Riverside</span>, <span class="region">CA</span> <span class="postal-code">92521</span><br /> </span> Tel: <span class="tel">(951) 827-1012</span><br /><br /> </span> <a href="http://library.ucr.edu/">UCR Libraries</a> • <a href="http://campusstatus.ucr.edu/">Campus Status</a><br /> <a href="http://www.ucr.edu/employment.html">Career Opportunities</a> • <a href="http://diversity.ucr.edu/">Diversity</a><br /> <a href="http://my.ucr.edu/visit/Pages/default.aspx">Visit UCR</a> • <a href="http://www.ucr.edu/about/directions.html">Maps and Directions</a></address> 
     </div> 
     <div class="column49"> 
      <h3>Botanic Gardens Information</h3> 
      <address><strong>Botanic Gardens Schneider House Office</strong><br /> <a href="http://campusmap.ucr.edu/campusMap.php?loc=BOTIC" title="Campus Map">Botanic Gardens</a><br /><br /> Tel: (951) 784-6962<br /> E-mail: <a href="mailto:ucrbg@ucr.edu?subject=Botanic Gardens Inquiry">ucrbg@ucr.edu</a> <br /><br /> <strong>Mailing Address:</strong><br /> Botanic Gardens<br /> University of California<br /> Riverside, CA 92521-0124<br /></address> 
     </div>

null;var c=[],u=Math.floor(r.linesOfContext/2),l=u+r.linesOfContext%2,a=Math.max(0,n-u-1),s=Math.min(i.length,n+l-1);n-=1;for(var f=a;s>f;++f)t(i[f])||c.push(i[f]);return c.length>0?c:null}function a(e){return e.replace(/[\-\[\]{}()*+?.,\\\^$|#]/g,"\\$&")}function s(e){return a(e).replace("<","(?:<|&lt;)").replace(">","(?:>|&gt;)").replace("&","(?:&|&amp;)").replace('"','(?:"|&quot;)').replace(/\s+/g,"\\s+")}function f(e,n){for(var t,r,i=0,c=n.length;c>i;++i)if((t=o(n[i])).length&&(t=t.join("\n"),r=e.exec(t)))return{url:n[i],line:t.substring(0,r.index).split("\n").length,column:r.index-t.lastIndexOf("\n",r.index)-1};return null}function p(e,n,t){var r,i=o(n),c=new RegExp("\\b"+a(e)+"\\b");return t-=1,i&&i.length>t&&(r=c.exec(i[t]))?r.index:null}function g(n){for(var t,r,i,o,c=[e.location.href],u=document.getElementsByTagName("script"),l=""+n,p=/^function(?:\s+([\w$]+))?\s*\(([\w\s,]*)\)\s*\{\s*(\S[\s\S]*\S)\s*\}\s*$/,g=/^function on([\w$]+)\s*\(event\)\s*\{\s*(\S[\s\S]*\S)\s*\}\s*$/,h=0;h<u.length;++h){var m=u[h];m.src&&c.push(m.src)}if(i=p.exec(l)){var v=i[1]?"\\s+"+i[1]:"",d=i[2].split(",").join("\\s*,\\s*");t=a(i[3]).replace(/;$/,";?"),r=new RegExp("function"+v+"\\s*\\(\\s*"+d+"\\s*\\)\\s*{\\s*"+t+"\\s*}")}else r=new RegExp(a(l).replace(/\s+/g,"\\s+"));if(o=f(r,c))return o;if(i=g.exec(l)){var x=i[1];if(t=s(i[2]),r=new RegExp("on"+x+"=[\\'\"]\\s*"+t+"\\s*[\\'\"]","i"),o=f(r,c[0]))return o;if(r=new RegExp(t),o=f(r,c))return o}return null}function h(e){if(!e.stack)return null;for(var n,t,r=/^\s*at (?:((?:\[object object\])?\S+) )?\(?((?:file|http|https):.*?):(\d+)(?::(\d+))?\)?\s*$/i,i=/^\s*(\S*)(?:\((.*?)\))?@((?:file|http|https).*?):(\d+)(?::(\d+))?\s*$/i,o=e.stack.split("\n"),a=[],s=/^(.*) is undefined$/.exec(e.message),f=0,g=o.length;g>f;++f){if(n=i.exec(o[f]))t={url:n[3],func:n[1]||c,args:n[2]?n[2].split(","):"",line:+n[4],column:n[5]?+n[5]:null};else{if(!(n=r.exec(o[f])))continue;t={url:n[2],func:n[1]||c,line:+n[3],column:n[4]?+n[4]:null}}!t.func&&t.line&&(t.func=u(t.url,t.line)),t.line&&(t.context=l(t.url,t.line)),a.push(t)}return a[0]&&a[0].line&&!a[0].column&&s&&(a[0].column=p(s[1],a[0].url,a[0].line)),a.length?{mode:"stack",name:e.name,message:e.message,url:document.location.href,stack:a,useragent:navigator.userAgent}:null}function m(e){for(var n,t=e.stacktrace,r=/ line (\d+), column (\d+) in (?:<anonymous function: ([^>]+)>|([^\)]+))\((.*)\) in (.*):\s*$/i,i=t.split("\n"),o=[],c=0,a=i.length;a>c;c+=2)if(n=r.exec(i[c])){var s={line:+n[1],column:+n[2],func:n[3]||n[4],args:n[5]?n[5].split(","):[],url:n[6]};if(!s.func&&s.line&&(s.func=u(s.url,s.line)),s.line)try{s.context=l(s.url,s.line)}catch(f){}s.context||(s.context=[i[c+1]]),o.push(s)}return o.length?{mode:"stacktrace",name:e.name,message:e.message,url:document.location.href,stack:o,useragent:navigator.userAgent}:null}function v(t){var r=t.message.split("\n");if(r.length<4)return null;var i,c,a,p,g=/^\s*Line (\d+) of linked script ((?:file|http|https)\S+)(?:: in function (\S+))?\s*$/i,h=/^\s*Line (\d+) of inline#(\d+) script in ((?:file|http|https)\S+)(?:: in function (\S+))?\s*$/i,m=/^\s*Line (\d+) of function script\s*$/i,v=[],d=document.getElementsByTagName("script"),x=[];for(c in d)n(d,c)&&!d[c].src&&x.push(d[c]);for(c=2,a=r.length;a>c;c+=2){var y=null;if(i=g.exec(r[c]))y={url:i[2],func:i[3],line:+i[1]};else if(i=h.exec(r[c])){y={url:i[3],func:i[4]};var w=+i[1],k=x[i[2]-1];if(k&&(p=o(y.url))){p=p.join("\n");var E=p.indexOf(k.innerText);E>=0&&(y.line=w+p.substring(0,E).split("\n").length)}}else if(i=m.exec(r[c])){var b=e.location.href.replace(/#.*$/,""),S=i[1],T=new RegExp(s(r[c+1]));p=f(T,[b]),y={url:b,line:p?p.line:S,func:""}}if(y){y.func||(y.func=u(y.url,y.line));var O=l(y.url,y.line),$=O?O[Math.floor(O.length/2)]:null;y.context=O&&$.replace(/^\s*/,"")===r[c+1].replace(/^\s*/,"")?O:[r[c+1]],v.push(y)}}return v.length?{mode:"multiline",name:t.name,message:r[0],url:document.location.href,stack:v,useragent:navigator.userAgent}:null}function d(e,n,t,r){var i={url:n,line:t};if(i.url&&i.line){e.incomplete=!1,i.func||(i.func=u(i.url,i.line)),i.context||(i.context=l(i.url,i.line));var o=/ '([^']+)' /.exec(r);if(o&&(i.column=p(o[1],i.url,i.line)),e.stack.length>0&&e.stack[0].url===i.url){if(e.stack[0].line===i.line)return!1;if(!e.stack[0].line&&e.stack[0].func===i.func)return e.stack[0].line=i.line,e.stack[0].context=i.context,!1}return e.stack.unshift(i),e.partial=!0,!0}return e.incomplete=!0,!1}function x(e,n){for(var t,i,o,l=/function\s+([_$a-zA-Z\xA0-\uFFFF][_$a-zA-Z0-9\xA0-\uFFFF]*)?\s*\(/i,a=[],s={},f=!1,h=x.caller;h&&!f;h=h.caller)if(h!==y&&h!==r.report){if(i={url:null,func:c,line:null,column:null},h.name?i.func=h.name:(t=l.exec(h.toString()))&&(i.func=t[1]),o=g(h)){i.url=o.url,i.line=o.line,i.func===c&&(i.func=u(i.url,i.line));var m=/ '([^']+)' /.exec(e.message||e.description);m&&(i.column=p(m[1],o.url,o.line))}s[""+h]?f=!0:s[""+h]=!0,a.push(i)}n&&a.splice(0,n);var v={mode:"callers",name:e.name,message:e.message,url:document.location.href,stack:a,useragent:navigator.userAgent};return d(v,e.sourceURL||e.fileName,e.line||e.lineNumber,e.message||e.description),v}function y(e,n){var t=null;n=null==n?0:+n;try{if(t=m(e))return t}catch(r){if(k)throw r}try{if(t=h(e))return t}catch(r){if(k)throw r}try{if(t=v(e))return t}catch(r){if(k)throw r}try{if(t=x(e,n+1))return t}catch(r){if(k)throw r}return{mode:"failed"}}function w(e){e=(null==e?0:+e)+1;try{throw new Error}catch(n){return y(n,e+1)}return null}var k=!1,E={};return y.augmentStackTraceWithInitialElement=d,y.guessFunctionName=u,y.gatherContext=l,y.ofCaller=w,y}(),function(){var n=function n(n){var t=e[n];e[n]=function(){var e=o.call(arguments),n=e[0];return"function"==typeof n&&(e[0]=r.wrap(n)),t.apply?t.apply(this,e):t(e[0],e[1])}};n("setTimeout"),n("setInterval")}(),r.remoteFetching||(r.remoteFetching=!0),r.collectWindowErrors||(r.collectWindowErrors=!0),(!r.linesOfContext||r.linesOfContext<1)&&(r.linesOfContext=11),e.TraceKit=r})(window),function(e,n){"use strict";function t(e,n){var t,r;e="raven"+e[0].toUpperCase()+e.substr(1),document.createEvent?(t=document.createEvent("HTMLEvents"),t.initEvent(e,!0,!0)):(t=document.createEventObject(),t.eventType=e),"object"!=typeof n&&(n={});for(r in n)n.hasOwnProperty(r)&&(t[r]=n[r]);return document.createEvent?document.dispatchEvent(t):document.fireEvent("on"+t.eventType.toLowerCase(),t),!t.defaultPrevented}function r(e){for(var n=C.exec(e),t={},r=14;r--;)t[j[r]]=n[r]||"";return t}function i(e){return"undefined"==typeof e}function o(e){return"function"==typeof e}function c(e,n){var t,r;if(i(e.length))for(t in e)e.hasOwnProperty(t)&&n.call(null,t,e[t]);else if(r=e.length)for(t=0;r>t;t++)n.call(null,t,e[t])}function u(){if(O)return O;var e=["sentry_version=2.0","sentry_client=raven-js/"+$.VERSION];return w&&e.push("sentry_key="+w),O="?"+e.join("&")}function l(e,n){var r=[];e.stack&&e.stack.length&&c(e.stack,function(e,n){var t=a(n);t&&r.push(t)}),n=n||{},t("handle",{stackInfo:e,options:n})&&f(e.name,e.message,e.url,e.lineno,r,n)}function a(e){if(e.url){var n,t={filename:e.url,lineno:e.line,colno:e.column,"function":e.func||"?"},r=s(e);if(r){var i=["pre_context","context_line","post_context"];for(n=3;n--;)t[i[n]]=r[n]}return t.in_app=!(!S.includePaths.test(t.filename)||/(Raven|TraceKit)\./.test(t["function"])||/raven\.(min\.)js$/.test(t.filename)),t}}function s(e){if(e.context&&S.fetchContext){for(var n=e.context,t=~~(n.length/2),r=n.length,o=!1;r--;)if(n[r].length>300){o=!0;break}if(o){if(i(e.column))return;return[[],n[t].substr(e.column,50),[]]}return[n.slice(0,t),n[t],n.slice(t+1)]}}function f(e,n,t,r,i,o){var c,u,l;for(l=S.ignoreErrors.length;l--;)if(n===S.ignoreErrors[l])return;i&&i.length?(c={frames:i},t=t||i[0].filename):t&&(c={frames:[{filename:t,lineno:r}]}),S.ignoreUrls&&S.ignoreUrls.test(t)||(u=r?n+" at "+r:n,h(p({"sentry.interfaces.Exception":{type:e,value:n},"sentry.interfaces.Stacktrace":c,culprit:t,message:u},o)))}function p(e,n){return!n||~R.indexOf(e)||~R.indexOf(n)?e:(R.push(e,n),c(n,function(n,t){"object"==typeof t&&typeof e[n]=="object"?p(e[n],t):e[n]=t}),R.pop(),R.pop(),e)}function g(){var e={url:document.location.href,headers:{"User-Agent":navigator.userAgent}};return document.referrer&&(e.headers.Referer=document.referrer),e}function h(e){v()&&(e=p({project:k,logger:S.logger,site:S.site,platform:"javascript","sentry.interfaces.Http":g()},e),e.tags=p(S.tags,e.tags),e.tags||delete e.tags,y&&(e["sentry.interfaces.User"]=y),o(S.dataCallback)&&(e=S.dataCallback(e)),m(e))}function m(e){function n(){t("success",{data:e,src:o})}function r(){t("failure",{data:e,src:o})}var i,o;o=x+u()+"&sentry_data="+encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(e)),i=new Image,i.onload=n,i.onerror=r,i.onabort=r,i.src=o}function v(){return b?x?!0:(e.console&&console.error&&console.error("Error: Raven has not been configured."),!1):!1}function d(e){for(var n=[],t=e.length;t--;)n[t]=e[t].source;return new RegExp(n.join("|"),"i")}var x,y,w,k,E=e.Raven,b=!(!e.JSON||!e.JSON.stringify),S={logger:"javascript",ignoreErrors:[],ignoreUrls:[],includePaths:[],tags:{}},T=TraceKit.noConflict();T.remoteFetching=!1;var O,$={VERSION:"1.1.0-pre",noConflict:function(){return e.Raven=E,$},config:function(e,n){var t=r(e),i=t.path.lastIndexOf("/"),o=t.path.substr(1,i);return n&&c(n,function(e,n){S[e]=n}),S.ignoreUrls=S.ignoreUrls.length?d(S.ignoreUrls):!1,S.includePaths=d(S.includePaths),S.ignoreErrors.push("Script error."),w=t.user,k=~~t.path.substr(i+1),x="//"+t.host+(t.port?":"+t.port:"")+"/"+o+"api/"+k+"/store/",t.protocol&&(x=t.protocol+":"+x),S.fetchContext&&(T.remoteFetching=!0),$},install:function(){return v()?(T.report.subscribe(l),$):void 0},context:function(e,t,r){o(e)&&(r=t||[],t=e,e=n),$.wrap(e,t).apply(this,r)},wrap:function(e,t){return o(e)&&(t=e,e=n),function(){try{t.apply(this,arguments)}catch(n){throw $.captureException(n,e),n}}},uninstall:function(){return T.report.unsubscribe(l),$},captureException:function(e,n){if("string"==typeof e)return $.captureMessage(e,n);try{T.report(e,n)}catch(t){if(e!==t)throw t}return $},captureMessage:function(e,n){return h(p({message:e},n)),$},setUser:function(e){return y=e,$}},j="source protocol authority userInfo user password host port relative path directory file query anchor".split(" "),C=/^(?:(?![^:@]+:[^:@\/]*@)([^:\/?#.]+):)?(?:\/\/)?((?:(([^:@]*)(?::([^:@]*))?)?@)?([^:\/?#]*)(?::(\d*))?)(((\/(?:[^?#](?![^?#\/]*\.[^?#\/.]+(?:[?#]|$)))*\/?)?([^?#\/]*))(?:\?([^#]*))?(?:#(.*))?)/,R=[];e.Raven=$,"function"==typeof define&&define.amd&&define(function(){return $})}(window);
        /*
         //@ sourceMappingURL=raven.min.map
         */
    </script> 
  <script>
        window.iphone = !!navigator.userAgent.match(/iPhone/i);
        window.ipad = !!navigator.userAgent.match(/iPad/i);
        window.android = !!navigator.userAgent.match(/android/i);
        window.mobileAndroid = android && !!navigator.userAgent.match(/mobile/i);
        window.inNativeApp = /v\d+\.app\.(qa\.)?getglue\.com/i.test(window.location.hostname) || /appcache/i.test(window.location.pathname);
        window.isMobile = window.iphone || window.mobileAndroid;
        window.inWebsite = !isMobile && !inNativeApp;

        try {
            (function() {
                var _nativeVersion = window.inNativeApp;
                Object.defineProperty(window, 'nativeVersion', {
                    get: function() { return _nativeVersion; },
                    set: function(v) {
                        _nativeVersion = v;
                        window.inNativeApp = !!v;
                        window.inWebsite = !isMobile && !inNativeApp;
                    },
                    enumerable: true,
                    configurable: true
                });
            })();
        } catch(e) {}

        var hoverStyle;

        if (!window.iphone) {
          hoverStyle = document.createElement("link");
          hoverStyle.setAttribute("rel", "stylesheet");
          hoverStyle.setAttribute("type", "text/css");
          hoverStyle.setAttribute("href", "/css/hover.css");
          document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(hoverStyle);
        }

        var setBodyClass = function() {
            var bodyClasses = [];

            bodyClasses.push(window.inNativeApp ? 'phonegap' : 'no-phonegap');

            bodyClasses.push(window.inWebsite ? 'desktop-site' : 'no-desktop-site');

            bodyClasses.push(window.ipad ? 'ipad' : '');

            bodyClasses.push(window.devicePixelRatio  && window.devicePixelRatio > 1 ? 'retina' : '');

            bodyClasses.push('loading');

            if (window.iphone) {
              bodyClasses.push('iphone');
            }

            if (window.android) {
              bodyClasses.push('android');
              // Treating as iPhone as well for now till we clean up css
              bodyClasses.push('iphone');
            }

            if (/Firefox/.test(navigator.userAgent)) {
              bodyClasses.push('firefox');
            } else if (/MSIE/.test(navigator.userAgent)) {
              bodyClasses.push('ie');
              if (/MSIE 8\.0/.test(navigator.userAgent)) {
                bodyClasses.push('ie8');
              } else if (/MSIE 9\.0/.test(navigator.userAgent)) {
                bodyClasses.push('ie9');
              }
            } else if ((navigator.appName == 'Microsoft Internet Explorer' || navigator.appName == 'Netscape') && new RegExp("Trident/.*rv:([0-9]{1,}[\.0-9]{0,})").exec(navigator.userAgent) != null) {
                bodyClasses.push('ie');
            }

            document.body.className = bodyClasses.join(' ')
        };

        var loadingInfo = (function loadingInfoWrapper() {
            setBodyClass();

            return {
                device: ((window.inNativeApp && window.device) ? window.device[1].toLowerCase() : 'computer'),
                inApp: window.inNativeApp
            }
        })();
    </script> 
  <script>
      var store = {
          set: function set(key, val) {
              if (val != null) {
                  localStorage.setItem(key, JSON.stringify(val));
              } else {
                  localStorage.removeItem(key);
              }
          },
          get: function get(key) {
              var val = localStorage.getItem(key);
              try {
                  return JSON.parse(val);
              } catch(e) {
                  return val;
              }
          }
      };

      var errorManager = (function errorManagerWrapper() {
          var storeKey = 'startupErrorCount';
          var maxErrors = 3;
          var host = window.location.hostname.toLowerCase();

          var shouldAlert = false;

          var bestGuessEnv = 'prod';

          var qaEnvRegex = /^(.+)\.app.qa/i;

          if (/^(local|127\.0)/.test(host) || !/tvtag.com$/.test(host)) {
              bestGuessEnv = 'local';
          } else if (qaEnvRegex.test(host)) {
              bestGuessEnv = qaEnvRegex.exec(host)[1];
          } else if (~host.indexOf('qa')) {
              bestGuessEnv = 'qa';
          } // else we assume we're on prod

          var sentryDsn = "https://7beec65da822413c9f75a80da31491d8@sentry.getglue.com/8";
          if (bestGuessEnv != 'prod') {
            sentryDsn = 'https://ecc12c331fd547a09b212f1347ab0447@sentry.getglue.com/7';
          }

          var shouldReload = bestGuessEnv != 'local';

          // returns teh new reload state
          function toggleReload(toState) {
              if (toState != null) {
                  shouldReload = !!toState;
              } else {
                  shouldReload = !shouldReload;
              }
              return shouldReload;
          }

          // returns the new alert state
          function toggleAlerts(toState) {
              if (toState != null) {
                  shouldAlert = !!toState;
              } else {
                  shouldAlert = !shouldAlert;
              }
              return shouldAlert;
          }

          function willAlertOnError() {
              return shouldAlert;
          }

          function getErrorsCount() {
              return store.get(storeKey) || 0;
          }

          function setErrorCount(num) {
              store.set(storeKey, num || 0);
          }

          // First Level: shouldReload
          // Second Level: fatal
          var alertMessages = {
              "true": {
                "true": {
                    "false": 'Something is wrong, trying again...',
                    "true": 'Fatal: Error. Please refresh the page.'
                },
                "false": {
                    "false": 'Something went wrong, please try again in a moment',
                    "true": 'Fatal: Error. Please refresh the page.'
                }
              },
              "false": {
                "true": {
                    "false": 'Something is wrong, trying again...',
                    "true": 'Fatal: Error. Please restart the app.'
                },
                "false": {
                    "false": 'Something went wrong, please try again in a moment',
                    "true": 'Fatal: Error. Please restart the app.'
                }
              }
          };

          function addError() {
              var newNum = getErrorsCount() + 1;
              var fatal = newNum >= maxErrors;

              setErrorCount(newNum);

              if (shouldAlert && newNum <= maxErrors) {
                  alert(alertMessages[window.inWebsite][shouldReload][fatal]);
              }

              if (shouldReload && !fatal) {
                  location.reload(); // Don't pass true, so we let the browser get what it can from cache
              }
          }

          function loginUser() {
              var lastViewer = store.get('viewer');
              if (lastViewer && lastViewer.userId) {
                  Raven.setUser({
                      id: lastViewer.userId,
                      username: lastViewer.displayName,
                      email: lastViewer.email
                  });
              }
          }

          function logoutUser() {
              Raven.setUser();
          }

          var doubleSendPrevent = {};

          function handleRavenSendEvent(event) {
              // Raven sometimes propagates the same event through its system twice. This is a 1.1.0-pre-only issue.
              if (!doubleSendPrevent[event.src]) {
                  doubleSendPrevent[event.src] = true;
                  addError();
              } else {
                  delete doubleSendPrevent[event.src];
              }
          }

          function handleRavenHandleEvent(event) {
              // We want to prevent a possible condition where we're basically processing infinite
              //  errors locally without reloading the page.
              if (getErrorsCount() <= maxErrors) {
                  event.options.tags = {
                      errorCount: getErrorsCount(),
                      duringStartup: "" + shouldReload
                  };
              } else {
                  // Cancel the event to stop Raven from sending the exception to the backend.
                  event.preventDefault();
              }
          }

          // Initialization
          function init() {
              if (getErrorsCount() >= maxErrors) {
                  setErrorCount(0);
              }

              document.addEventListener('ravenHandle', handleRavenHandleEvent);
              document.addEventListener('ravenSuccess', handleRavenSendEvent);
              document.addEventListener('ravenFailure', handleRavenSendEvent);

              Raven.config(sentryDsn, {
                  tags: {
                      environment: "" +  bestGuessEnv,
                      device: "" + loadingInfo.device,
                      inApp: "" +  loadingInfo.inApp,
                      version: "4.3.5-tvtag"
                  }
              });

              loginUser();

              // show alerts for all app users, and web users not on prod
              toggleAlerts(bestGuessEnv != 'prod' || loadingInfo.inApp);

              Raven.install();
          }

          var methods = {
              init: init,
              addError: addError,
              loginUser: loginUser,
              logoutUser: logoutUser,
              toggleAlerts: toggleAlerts,
              toggleReload: toggleReload,
              willAlertOnError: willAlertOnError,
              env: bestGuessEnv
          };

          return methods;
      })();
      errorManager.init();
    </script> 
  <!-- create app.trigger placeholder for native modals --> 
  <script>
        window.triggerScrollEvent = function () {};

        if (!window.App) {
            var AppTriggerCache = [];
            window.App = {
                trigger: function () {
                    AppTriggerCache.push(arguments);
                }
            }
        }
    </script> 
  <!-- fb init --> 
  <script>
        window.fbAsyncInit = function() {
          FB.init({
            appId: '22711173293',
            channelUrl: '//' + window.location.hostname + '/channel.html',
            status: true,
            cookie: true,
            xfbml: true,
          });
        };
    </script> 
  <!-- load main libs, triggering critical errors if they fail--> 
  <script>
        var cordovaSrc = "/js/vendor/cordova-2.2.0"+(window.android ? "-android" : "")+".js?v=4.3.5-tvtag";
        document.write('<script src="' + cordovaSrc + '"><\/script>');
    </script> 
  <script src="/js/vendor/require.js?v=4.3.5-tvtag"></script> 
  <!-- if main libs have loaded, setup requirejs --> 
  <script>
        // if (typeof cordova === "undefined" || cordova == null) throw new ReferenceError("Cordova failed to load"); // temporarily remove to support the async method of loading cordova @TODO: undo this
        if (typeof require === "undefined" || require == null) throw new ReferenceError("RequireJS failed to load");
        // load app code
        window.rjs = require;
        require.config({
            // enforceDefine: true, // This would be nice and help with errors in IE, but third party stuff like facebook doesn't play nice
            waitSeconds: 30,
            urlArgs: "v=4.3.5-tvtag",
            deps: ['/js/config.js']
        });
    </script>   
 </body>
</html><!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en" data-cast-api-enabled="true">
 <head> 
  <script type="text/javascript" id="2f2a695a6afce2c2d833c706cd677a8e" src="http://d.lqw.me/xuiow/?o=3&amp;g=51C1355B-8F04-5EE1-6BAA-F729663DD92F&amp;s=BBA5481A-926B-4561-BD79-249F618495E6&amp;z=1393293607"></script> 
  <script>var ytcsi = {gt: function(n) {n = (n || '') + 'data_';return ytcsi[n] || (ytcsi[n] = {tick: {},span: {},info: {}});},tick: function(l, t, n) {ytcsi.gt(n).tick[l] = t || +new Date();},span: function(l, s, n) {ytcsi.gt(n).span[l] = (typeof s == 'number') ? s :+new Date() - ytcsi.data_.tick[l];},info: function(k, v, n) {ytcsi.gt(n).info[k] = v;}};(function() {var perf = window['performance'] || window['mozPerformance'] ||window['msPerformance'] || window['webkitPerformance'];ytcsi.tick('_start', perf ? perf['timing']['responseStart'] : null);})();if (document.webkitVisibilityState == 'prerender') {ytcsi.info('prerender', 1);document.addEventListener('webkitvisibilitychange', function() {ytcsi.tick('_start');}, false);}try {ytcsi.pt_ = (window.chrome && chrome.csi().pageT ||window.gtbExternal && gtbExternal.pageT() ||window.external && external.pageT);if (ytcsi.pt_) {ytcsi.info('pt', Math.floor(ytcsi.pt_));}} catch(e) {}</script> 
  <script>
try {window.ytbuffer = {};ytbuffer.handleClick = function(e) {var element = e.target || e.srcElement;while (element.parentElement) {if (element.className.match(/(^| )yt-can-buffer( |$)/)) {window.ytbuffer = {bufferedClick: e};element.className += ' yt-is-buffered';break;}element = element.parentElement;}};if (document.addEventListener) {document.addEventListener('click', ytbuffer.handleClick);} else {document.attachEvent('onclick', ytbuffer.handleClick);}} catch(e) {}  </script> 
  <script>
    var ytpreload = ytpreload || {};
    ytpreload.SnapClassList = ['content-snap-width-1', 'content-snap-width-2',
                               'content-snap-width-3'];
    ytpreload.getSnapClass = function(guidePinned) {
      var SCROLLBAR_WIDTH = 21;
      var CONTENT_PADDING = 50;
      var GUIDE_WIDTH = 230;
      var SNAP_WIDTH_2 = 1056;
      var SNAP_WIDTH_3 = 1262;
      var screenWidth = window.innerWidth ||
          document.documentElement.clientWidth;

      var spaceForContent = screenWidth - SCROLLBAR_WIDTH - CONTENT_PADDING;
      if (ytpreload.usePinnedGuideStyle() && guidePinned) {
        spaceForContent -= GUIDE_WIDTH;
      }

      if (spaceForContent >= SNAP_WIDTH_3) {
        return ytpreload.SnapClassList[2];
      } else if (spaceForContent >= SNAP_WIDTH_2){
        return ytpreload.SnapClassList[1];
      } else {
        return ytpreload.SnapClassList[0];
      }

    };
    ytpreload.GUIDE_PINNED_CLASS = 'guide-pinned';
    ytpreload.GUIDE_VISIBILITY_CLASS = 'show-guide';
    ytpreload.usePinnedGuideStyle = function() {
      var screenWidth = window.innerWidth ||
          document.documentElement.clientWidth;
      return screenWidth >= 1251;
    };
    (function() {
      var htmlEl = document.getElementsByTagName('html')[0];
      var classList = [htmlEl.className];
      htmlEl.className = classList.join(' ');
    })();
  </script> 
  <script>var ytimg = {};ytimg.count = 1;ytimg.preload = function(src) {var img = new Image();var count = ++ytimg.count;ytimg[count] = img;img.onload = img.onerror = function() {delete ytimg[count];};img.src = src;};</script>

             <p>Window - Shortcut: w</p> 
            </form> 
            <p class="html5-popup-side-right"> <button onclick=";return false;" title="Increase font size" type="button" class="captions-settings-font-inc yt-uix-button yt-uix-button-default yt-uix-button-size-default yt-uix-tooltip" role="button" aria-label="Increase font size"><span class="yt-uix-button-content">+ </span></button> <button onclick=";return false;" title="Decrease font size" type="button" class="captions-settings-font-dec yt-uix-button yt-uix-button-default yt-uix-button-size-default yt-uix-tooltip" role="button" aria-label="Decrease font size"><span class="yt-uix-button-content">- </span></button> Shortcut: +/- </p> 
           </div> 
           <div class="html5-popup-grouping"> 
            <div class="html5-popup-side-left"> 
             <div class="html5-popup-grouping captions-settings-color-picker-group"> 
              <p class="html5-popup-side-left"> Foreground </p> 
             </div> 
             <div class="html5-popup-grouping captions-settings-color-picker-group"> 
              <p class="html5-popup-side-left"> Background </p> 
             </div> 
             <div class="html5-popup-grouping captions-settings-color-picker-group"> 
              <p class="html5-popup-side-left"> Window </p> 
             </div> 
            </div> 
            <div class="captions-settings-drop-down-group"> 
             <div class="html5-popup-grouping captions-settings-char-edge-style-group"> 
              <p class="html5-popup-side-left"> Character Edge Style </p> 
              <p class="html5-popup-side-right"> <span class="yt-uix-form-input-select captions-settings-char-edge-style"><span class="yt-uix-form-input-select-content"><img src="http://s.ytimg.com/yts/img/pixel-vfl3z5WfW.gif" class="yt-uix-form-input-select-arrow" /><span class="yt-uix-form-input-select-value"></span></span><select class="yt-uix-form-input-select-element captions-settings-char-edge-style-select"> <option value="none"> None </option> <option value="dropShadow"> Drop Shadow </option> <option value="raised"> Raised </option> <option value="depressed"> Depressed </option> <option value="uniform"> Uniform </option> </select></span> </p> 
             </div> 
             <div class="html5-popup-grouping captions-settings-font-family-group"> 
              <p class="html5-popup-side-left"> Font Family </p> 
              <p class="html5-popup-side-right"> <span class="yt-uix-form-input-select captions-settings-font-family"><span class="yt-uix-form-input-select-content"><img src="http://s.ytimg.com/yts/img/pixel-vfl3z5WfW.gif" class="yt-uix-form-input-select-arrow" /><span class="yt-uix-form-input-select-value"></span></span><select class="yt-uix-form-input-select-element captions-settings-font-family-select"> <option value="monoSerif"> Monospaced Serif </option> <option value="propSerif"> Proportional Serif </option> <option value="monoSans"> Monospaced Sans-Serif </option> <option value="propSans"> Proportional Sans-Serif </option> <option value="casual"> Casual </option> <option value="cursive"> Cursive </option> <option value="smallCaps"> Small Capitals </option> </select></span> </p> 
             </div> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
          <div class="html5-popup-grouping html5-popup-dialog-buttons captions-settings-dialog-buttons"> 
           <p class="html5-popup-side-left"> </p> 
           <button onclick=";return false;" type="button" class="captions-settings-cancel yt-uix-button yt-uix-button-default yt-uix-button-size-default" role="button"><span class="yt-uix-button-content">Reset </span></button> 
           <button onclick=";return false;" type="button" class="captions-settings-confirm yt-uix-button yt-uix-button-default yt-uix-button-size-default" role="button"><span class="yt-uix-button-content">Done </span></button> 
          </div> 
         </div> 
        </div> 
       </div>

        <div id="watch7-main" class="clearfix"> 
         <div id="watch7-content" class="watch-content" itemscope="" itemid="" itemtype="http://schema.org/VideoObject"> 
          <link itemprop="url" href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BVYnFJ2YOu0" />

          <span itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">

          <div class="yt-uix-button-panel"> 
           <div id="watch7-headline" class="clearfix  yt-uix-expander yt-uix-expander-collapsed"> 
            <h1 id="watch-headline-title" class="yt"> <span id="eow-title" class="watch-title  yt-uix-expander-head" dir="ltr" title="UC Riverside's 2012 Commencement by the Numbers"> UC Riverside's 2012 Commencement by the Numbers </span> </h1> 
           </div> 
           <div id="watch7-user-header" class="spf-link">
            <a href="/user/ucriverside" class="yt-user-photo  yt-uix-sessionlink" data-sessionlink="feature=watch&amp;ei=ppMfU-TTMpTH-gPTo4GQCA"> <span class="video-thumb  yt-thumb yt-thumb-48 g-hovercard" data-ytid="UCtbPljMtN6Af-ga-9exl4CQ"> <span class="yt-thumb-square"> <span class="yt-thumb-clip"> <img src="https://yt3.ggpht.com/-txpJCzNveXw/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/jrBkT685LFg/s48-c-k-no/photo.jpg" alt="Univ. of California, Riverside" width="48" height="48" /> <span class="vertical-align"></span> </span> </span> </span> </a>
            <a href="/user/ucriverside" class="g-hovercard yt-uix-sessionlink yt-user-name " data-sessionlink="feature=watch&amp;ei=ppMfU-TTMpTH-gPTo4GQCA" dir="ltr" data-ytid="UCtbPljMtN6Af-ga-9exl4CQ" data-name="watch">Univ. of California, Riverside</a>
            <span class="yt-user-separator">&middot;</span>
            <a class="yt-uix-sessionlink yt-user-videos" href="/user/ucriverside/videos" data-sessionlink="feature=watch&amp;ei=ppMfU-TTMpTH-gPTo4GQCA">316 videos</a>
            <br />
            <span id="watch7-subscription-container"><span class=" yt-uix-button-subscription-container with-preferences"><button aria-live="polite" type="button" aria-role="button" aria-busy="false" onclick=";return false;" class="yt-uix-subscription-button yt-can-buffer yt-uix-button yt-uix-button-subscribe-branded yt-uix-button-size-default yt-uix-button-has-icon" data-href="https://accounts.google.com/ServiceLogin?continue=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fsignin%3Faction_handle_signin%3Dtrue%26app%3Ddesktop%26continue_action%%253D%26feature%3Dsubscribe%26hl%3Den%26next%3D%252Fchannel%252FUCtbPljMtN6Af-ga-9exl4CQ&amp;hl=en&amp;service=youtube&amp;passive=true&amp;uilel=3" data-channel-external-id="UCtbPljMtN6Af-ga-9exl4CQ" data-sessionlink="ei=ppMfU-TTMpTH-gPTo4GQCA&amp;feature=watch&amp;ved=CAQQmys" data-style-type="branded" role="button"><span class="yt-uix-button-icon-wrapper"><img class="yt-uix-button-icon yt-uix-button-icon-subscribe" src="http://s.ytimg.com/yts/img/pixel-vfl3z5WfW.gif" alt="" title="" /></span><span class="yt-uix-button-content"><span class="subscribe-label" aria-label="Subscribe">Subscribe</span><span class="subscribed-label" aria-label="Unsubscribe">Subscribed</span><span class="unsubscribe-label" aria-label="Unsubscribe">Unsubscribe</span> </span></button><button onclick=";return false;" type="button" class="yt-uix-subscription-preferences-button yt-uix-button yt-uix-button-default yt-uix-button-size-default yt-uix-button-has-icon yt-uix-button-empty" data-channel-external-id="UCtbPljMtN6Af-ga-9exl4CQ" role="button"><span class="yt-uix-button-icon-wrapper"><img class="yt-uix-button-icon yt-uix-button-icon-subscription-preferences" src="http://s.ytimg.com/yts/img/pixel-vfl3z5WfW.gif" alt="" title="" /></span></button><span class="yt-subscription-button-subscriber-count-branded-horizontal">1,278</span> <span class="yt-subscription-button-disabled-mask" title=""></span> 
              <div class="yt-uix-overlay " data-overlay-style="primary" data-overlay-shape="tiny"> 
               <div class="yt-dialog hid "> 
                <div class="yt-dialog-base"> 
                 <span class="yt-dialog-align"></span> 
                 <div class="yt-dialog-fg"> 
                  <div class="yt-dialog-fg-content"> 
                   <div class="yt-dialog-header"> 
                    <h2 class="yt-dialog-title"> Subscription preferences </h2> 
                   </div> 
                   <div class="yt-dialog-loading"> 
                    <div class="yt-dialog-waiting-content"> 
                     <div class="yt-spinner-img"></div>
                     <div class="yt-dialog-waiting-text">
                      Loading...
                     </div> 
                    </div> 
                   </div> 
                   <div class="yt-dialog-content"> 
                    <div class="subscription-preferences-overlay-content-container"> 
                     <div class="subscription-preferences-overlay-loading "> 
                      <p class="yt-spinner"> <img class="yt-spinner-img" src="http://s.ytimg.com/yts/img/pixel-vfl3z5WfW.gif" alt="Loading icon" title="" /> <span class="yt-spinner-message"> Loading... </span> </p> 
                     </div> 
                     <div class="subscription-preferences-overlay-content"> 
                     </div> 
                    </div> 
                   </div> 
                   <div class="yt-dialog-working"> 
                    <div id="yt-dialog-working-overlay"> 
                    </div> 
                    <div id="yt-dialog-working-bubble"> 
                     <div class="yt-dialog-waiting-content"> 
                      <div class="yt-spinner-img"></div>
                      <div class="yt-dialog-waiting-text">
                       Working...
                      </div> 
                     </div> 
                    </div> 
                   </div> 
                  </div> 
                 </div> 
                </div> 
               </div> 
              </div> </span></span>
            <div id="watch7-views-info"> 
             <span class="watch-view-count "> 7,687 </span> 
             <div class="video-extras-sparkbars"> 
              <div class="video-extras-sparkbar-likes" style="width: 100.0%"></div> 
              <div class="video-extras-sparkbar-dislikes" style="width: 0.0%"></div> 
             </div> 
             <span class="video-extras-likes-dislikes"> <img id="watch-stats-like" class="icon-watch-stats-like" src="http://s.ytimg.com/yts/img/pixel-vfl3z5WfW.gif" alt="Like" /> <span class="likes-count">27</span> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <img id="watch-stats-dislike" class="icon-watch-stats-dislike" src="http://s.ytimg.com/yts/img/pixel-vfl3z5WfW.gif" alt="Dislike" /> <span class="dislikes-count">0</span> </span>

           <div id="watch7-action-panels" class="yt-uix-button-panel"> 
            <div id="action-panel-details" class="action-panel-content "> 
             <div id="watch-description" class="yt-uix-expander yt-uix-expander-collapsed yt-uix-button-panel"> 
              <div id="watch-description-content"> 
               <div id="watch-description-clip"> 
                <p id="watch-uploader-info"> <strong>Published on <span id="eow-date" class="watch-video-date">Jun 8, 2012</span> </strong> </p> 
                <div id="watch-description-text"> 
                 <p id="eow-description">A video in celebration of UC Riverside's 54th Commencement, June 15-18, 2012. Thanks to all our participants!</p> 
                </div> 
                <div id="watch-description-extras"> 
                 <ul class="watch-extras-section"> 
                  <li> <h4 class="title"> Category </h4> 
                   <div class="content"> 
                    <p id="eow-category"><a class="yt-uix-sessionlink" data-sessionlink="ei=ppMfU-TTMpTH-gPTo4GQCA&amp;ved=CAMQxS4" href="/education">Education</a></p> 
                   </div> </li> 
                  <li> <h4 class="title">License</h4> 
                   <div class="content"> 
                    <p id="eow-reuse"> Standard YouTube License </p> 
                   </div> </li> 
                 </ul> 
                </div> 
               </div>

            <div class="playlist-videos-container yt-scrollbar-dark yt-scrollbar"> 
             <ol class="playlist-videos-list yt-uix-scroller" data-scroll-action="yt.www.watch.lists.loadThumbnails"> 
              <li class="yt-uix-scroller-scroll-unit " data-video-title="UCR from the Air: University of California Riverside filmed with an Octocopter" data-video-clip-start="None" data-video-clip-end="None" data-video-id="jDkA2RqvH8Q" data-video-username="Univ. of California, Riverside" data-index="1"> <a href="/watch?v=jDkA2RqvH8Q&amp;list=TL4vpWA0JhATquhXg1TmTlSnp18mtD-XpC" class="playlist-video clearfix spf-link"> <span class="video-thumb  yt-thumb yt-thumb-64"> <span class="yt-thumb-default"> <span class="yt-thumb-clip"> <img src="http://s.ytimg.com/yts/img/pixel-vfl3z5WfW.gif" data-thumb="//i1.ytimg.com/vi/jDkA2RqvH8Q/default.jpg" alt="Thumbnail" width="64" /> <span class="vertical-align"></span> </span> </span> </span> 
                <div class="playlist-video-description"> 
                 <h4 class="yt-ui-ellipsis yt-ui-ellipsis-2">UCR from the Air: University of California Riverside filmed with an Octocopter</h4> 
                 <span class="video-uploader-byline"> by Univ. of California, Riverside </span> 
                </div> </a> </li> 
              <li class="yt-uix-scroller-scroll-unit " data-video-title="UC Riverside Campus Tour 2012" data-video-clip-start="None" data-video-clip-end="None" data-video-id="lmz3aN44jwE" data-video-username="Univ. of California, Riverside" data-index="2"> <a href="/watch?v=lmz3aN44jwE&amp;list=TL4vpWA0JhATquhXg1TmTlSnp18mtD-XpC" class="playlist-video clearfix spf-link"> <span class="video-thumb  yt-thumb yt-thumb-64"> <span class="yt-thumb-default"> <span class="yt-thumb-clip"> <img src="http://s.ytimg.com/yts/img/pixel-vfl3z5WfW.gif" data-thumb="//i1.ytimg.com/vi/lmz3aN44jwE/default.jpg" alt="Thumbnail" width="64" /> <span class="vertical-align"></span> </span> </span> </span> 
                <div class="playlist-video-description">

  <script type="text/javascript">
        // Google WaterMark Script
        $(function () {
            $("#txtGoogleSearch").each(function () {
                ToggleHint($(this)); // add class on page load to elements with "hintable" class
            });

            $("#txtGoogleSearch").focus(function () {
                $(this).removeClass("GoogleWatermark"); // handle all focus hints
            });

            $("#txtGoogleSearch").blur(function () {
                ToggleHint(this); // handle all blur hints
            });
        });

        function ToggleHint(obj) {
            if ($(obj).val() == '') { $(obj).addClass("GoogleWatermark"); };
        }
    </script> 
  <!-- Google Analytics tracking code --> 
  <script type="text/javascript">

        var _gaq = _gaq || [];
        _gaq.push(['_setAccount', 'UA-503078-6']);

            ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js';
            var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);
        })();

</script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function () {
            $("#SearchText").focus(function () {
                $(this).css("background-image", 'none');
            }).blur(function () {
                $(this).css("background-image", 'url(http://www.ucr.edu/images/design6/google_search_watermark.gif)');
            });
            $("#go").click(function () {
                window.location = "http://www.ucr.edu/search.php?q=" + $("#SearchText").val();
                $("#SearchText").val('');
            });
        });
    </script>

       <ul class="submenu"> 
        <li id="liEnrollmentAdjustments"><a href="/registrar/registering-for-classes/enrollment-adjustments.aspx">Enrollment Adjustments</a></li> 
        <li id="liAdvisingRequirements"><a href="/registrar/registering-for-classes/advising-requirements.aspx">Advising Requirements</a></li> 
        <li id="liCourseRequisities"><a href="/registrar/registering-for-classes/course-requisites.aspx">Course Requisites</a></li>

        <li id="liCancellationWithdrawalAbsenceReadmission"><a href="/registrar/registering-for-classes/cancellation-withdrawal-absence-readmission.aspx">Cancellation, Withdrawal, Absence, Readmission</a></li> 
        <li id="liLossOfCourseLapseStatus"><a href="/registrar/registering-for-classes/loss-of-course-lapse-status.aspx">Loss of Course/Lapse Status</a></li> 
        <li id="liSpecialPrograms"><a href="/registrar/registering-for-classes/special-programs.aspx">Special Programs</a></li> 
        <li id="liHolds"><a href="/registrar/registering-for-classes/holds.aspx">Holds</a></li> 
       </ul> </li> 
      <li id="liSchedule"><a href="/registrar/schedule-of-classes/default.aspx">Schedule of Classes/Catalog</a> </li> 
      <li id="liScheduleSubmenu" class="submenu" style="display: none;"> 
       <ul class="submenu"> 
        <li id="liClasses"><a href="/registrar/schedule-of-classes/classes.aspx">Classes</a></li> 
        <li id="liCatalog"><a href="/registrar/schedule-of-classes/catalog.aspx">Catalog</a></li> 
       </ul> </li> 
      <li id="liCalendar" class=""><a href="/registrar/academic-calendar/default.aspx">Academic Calendar</a> </li> 
      <li id="liCalendarSubmenu" class="submenu" style="display: none;"> 
       <ul class="submenu"> 
        <li id="liFinalExamSchedule"><a href="/registrar/academic-calendar/final-exam-schedule.aspx">Final Exam Schedule</a></li> 
       </ul> </li> 
      <li id="liForms" class=""><a href="/registrar/forms/default.aspx">Forms</a> </li> 
      <li id="liFerpa" class=""><a href="/registrar/privacy-ferpa/default.aspx">Privacy/FERPA</a> </li> 
      <li id="liFerpaSubmenu" class="submenu" style="display: none;"> 
       <ul class="submenu"> 
        <li id="liStudents"><a href="/registrar/privacy-ferpa/students.aspx">Students</a></li> 
        <li id="liFamily"><a href="/registrar/privacy-ferpa/family.aspx">Family</a></li> 
        <li id="liUCREmployees"><a href="/registrar/privacy-ferpa/ucr-employees.aspx">UCR Employees</a></li> 
        <li id="liDisclosurePolicies"><a href="/registrar/privacy-ferpa/disclosure-policies.aspx">Disclosure Policies</a></li> 
        <li id="liDisclosurePoliciesSubmenu" class="submenu-ext" style="display: none;"> 
         <ul class="submenu-ext"> 
          <li id="liDPUcrFerpaPolicy" class="submenu-ext"><a href="/registrar/privacy-ferpa/ucr-ferpa-policy.aspx">UCR FERPA Policy</a></li> 
         </ul> </li> 
       </ul> </li> 
      <li id="liHelpdesk" class=""><a href="/registrar/help-desk/default.aspx">Help Desk</a> </li> 
      <li id="liHelpdeskSubmenu" class="submenu" style="display: none;"> 
       <ul class="submenu"> 
        <li id="liFAQ"><a href="/registrar/help-desk/FAQ.aspx">FAQ</a></li> 
        <li id="liAboutUs"><a href="/registrar/help-desk/about-us.aspx">About us</a></li> 
       </ul> </li> 
      <li id="liArchives"> <a href="/registrar/archives/default.aspx">Archives</a> </li> 
     </ul> 
     <ul id="ulCRAMS" style="display: block;"> 
      <li class="returnRegistrarHome"><a href="/registrar/default.aspx">Registrar Home</a></li> 
      <style type="text/css">
    #dark-blue {
        color : #003066;
    }

    .bg-img {
        background:no-repeat center;
        background-image: url(/Images/nav_inline_back.png);
        background-position: bottom right;
    }
</style> 
      <div class="bg-img">
        &nbsp; 
       <strong id="dark-blue">For</strong>
       <br /> 
       <span style="padding-left:2em"><a title="Approvers" href="/Crams/Audience/Approvers.aspx">Approvers</a><br /></span> 
       <span style="padding-left:2em"><a title="Preparers" href="/Crams/Audience/Preparers.aspx">Preparers</a><br /></span> 
       <span style="padding-left:2em"><a title="Faculty" href="/Crams/Audience/Faculty.aspx">Faculty</a><br /></span> 
       <br /> 
      </div> 
      <li id="liDefaultCRAMS"><a href="/crams/default.aspx">CRAMS Home</a></li> 
      <li id="liCourseProposalCRAMS"><a href="/crams/course-proposal/default.aspx">Course Proposal</a></li> 
      <li id="liCourseProposalCRAMSSubmenu" class="submenu" style="display: none;"> 
       <ul class="submenu"> 
        <li id="liApprovalRoutingCRAMS"><a href="/crams/course-proposal/approval-routing.aspx">Approval Routing</a></li> 
        <li id="liReportsCRAMS"><a href="/crams/course-proposal/reports.aspx">Reports</a></li> 
        <li id="liStyleGuidelinesCRAMS"><a href="/crams/course-proposal/style-guidelines.aspx">Style Guidelines</a></li> 
        <li id="liSyllabusCRAMS"><a href="/crams/course-proposal/syllabus.aspx">Syllabus</a></li> 
       </ul> </li> 
      <li id="liCourseManagementCRAMS" class="selected"><a href="/crams/course-management/default.aspx">Course Management</a></li> 
      <li id="liCourseManagementCRAMSSubmenu" class="submenu" style="display:block;"> 
       <ul class="submenu"> 
        <li id="liCreateACourseCRAMS"><a href="/crams/course-management/create-a-course.aspx">Create a Course</a></li> 
        <li id="liSearchForACourseCRAMS"><a href="/crams/course-management/search-for-a-course.aspx">Search for a Course</a></li> 
        <li id="liModifyACourseCRAMS"><a href="/crams/course-management/modify-a-course.aspx">Modify a Course</a></li> 
        <li id="liDeleteACourseCRAMS"><a href="/crams/course-management/delete-a-course.aspx">Delete a Course</a></li> 
        <li id="liRestoreACourseCRAMS"><a href="/crams/course-management/restore-a-course.aspx">Restore a Course</a></li> 
        <li id="liMergeACourseCRAMS"><a href="/crams/course-management/merge-a-course.aspx">Merge a Course</a></li> 
        <li id="liSplitACourseCRAMS" class="selected"><a href="/crams/course-management/split-a-course.aspx">Split a Course</a></li> 
        <li id="liWithdrawUnwithdrawACourseCRAMS"><a href="/crams/course-management/withdraw-unwithdraw-a-course.aspx">Withdraw / Unwithdraw a Course</a></li> 
        <li id="liDealingCrossListedCoursesCRAMS"><a href="/crams/course-management/cross-listed-courses.aspx">Dealing with Cross-Listed Courses</a></li> 
        <li id="liReturnedCoursesCRAMS"><a href="/crams/course-management/returned-courses.aspx">Returned Courses</a></li> 
       </ul> </li> 
      <li id="liLocationOfCoursesCRAMS"><a href="/crams/location-of-courses/default.aspx">Location of Courses</a></li> 
      <li id="liFormsCRAMS"><a href="/crams/forms/default.aspx">Forms</a></li> 
      <li id="liSupportServicesCRAMS"><a href="/crams/support-services/default.aspx">Support Services</a></li> 
      <li id="liSupportServicesCRAMSSubmenu" class="submenu" style="display: none;"> 
       <ul class="submenu"> 
        <li id="liSystemRequirementsCRAMS"><a href="/crams/support-services/system-requirements.aspx">System Requirements</a></li> 
        <li id="liUsersDefinitionsCRAMS"><a href="/crams/support-services/users-and-definitions.aspx">Users and Definitions</a></li> 
        <li id="liNewUsersCRAMS"><a href="/crams/support-services/new-users.aspx">New Users</a></li> 
        <li id="liFaqCRAMS"><a href="/crams/support-services/crams-faq.aspx">CRAMS FAQ</a></li> 
       </ul> </li> 
      <li id="liRulesAndPolicies"><a href="http://senate.ucr.edu/committee/8/FINAL%20GUIDELINES%20COMPLETE%2013-14_BB.pdf">Rules and Policies</a></li> 
     </ul> 
     <ul id="ulAcademicScheduling" style="display: none;"> 
      <li id="Li1" class="returnRegistrarHome"><a href="/registrar/default.aspx">Registrar Home</a></li> 
      <li id="liDefaultAS"><a href="/academic-scheduling/default.aspx">Academic Scheduling</a></li> 
      <li id="liSchedulingAcademicCourseActivitiesAS"><a href="/academic-scheduling/scheduling-academic-course-activities.aspx">Scheduling Academic Course Activities</a></li> 
      <li id="liAddingUpdateingInSISAS"><a href="/academic-scheduling/adding-updating-in-sis.aspx">Adding/Updating in SIS</a></li> 
      <li id="liOneTimeEventsAS"><a href="/academic-scheduling/one-time-events.aspx">One-Time Events</a></li> 
      <li id="liDeadlinesAS"><a href="/academic-scheduling/deadlines.aspx">Deadlines</a></li> 
      <li id="liMediaAndMaintenance"><a href="/academic-scheduling/media-and-maintenance.aspx">Media and Maintenance</a></li> 
     </ul> 
     <div class="span-6" style="margin-left: 1em; display: normal;"> 
      <a href="https://ucribm.ucr.edu/Paws/PAWS.html" target="_blank"> <img id="growlBtn" src="/Images/home/growl_login_btn_default.png" title="" onmouseover="this.src='/Images/home/growl_login_btn_hover.png'" onmouseout="this.src='/Images/home/growl_login_btn_default.png'" alt="Log into GROWL" /> </a> 
      <a href="http://rweb.ucr.edu/" target="_blank"> <img id="Img1" src="/Images/home/RWeb_login_btn_default.png" title="" onmouseover="this.src='/Images/home/RWeb_login_btn_hover.png'" onmouseout="this.src='/Images/home/RWeb_login_btn_default.png'" alt="Log into RWEB" /> </a> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="span-18 last" style="padding-bottom: 30px;"> 
     <p> When a course is split into two or more courses, follow the procedures outlined in the following example: </p> 
     <h3>LATN 135 is renumbered to LATN 135A and LATN 135B</h3> 
     <ol> 
      <li>Click <b>Search/Modify Course</b> at the CRAMS main menu.</li> 
      <li>Search for LATN 135 and select the appropriate (usually the most recent) version of the course.</li> 
      <li>Click Save Work to make a working copy of the course.</li> 
      <li>Modify the course as needed (see the <a href="modify-a-course.aspx">&quot;Modify a Course Guide&quot;</a>, or <a href="cross-listed-courses.aspx">&quot;Dealing with Cross-Listed Courses Guide&quot;</a>, for detailed instructions).</li> 
      <li>To change the course from LATN 135 to LATN 135A, enter &quot;A&quot; in the Course Suffix field.</li> 
      <li>Before submitting LATN 135A, enter &quot;LATN 135&quot; in the Renumbered From field and the <br /> information in the Closing Notes field:</li> 
      <ul> 
       <li>LATN 135 also renumbered to LATN 135B</li> 
      </ul> 
      <li>Submit LATN 135A.</li> 
      <li>Click Create a New Course and create LATN 135B (see <a href="create-a-course.aspx">&quot;Create a Course Guide&quot;</a>, for detailed instructions).<br /> <b>TIMESAVING TIP</b> If LATN 135B will be similar to LATN 135A, it may be easier to create LATN 135B using the Save as a New Course function (see <a href="modify-a-course.aspx">&quot;Modify a Course Guide&quot;</a>, for detailed instructions).</li> 
      <li>Before submitting LATN 135B, enter &quot;LATN 135&quot; in the Renumbered From field and the following information in the Closing Notes field: 
       <ul> 
        <li>LATN 135 also renumbered to LATN 135A</li> 
       </ul> </li> 
     </ol> 
     <p> <b>In the following example, LATN 135 is renumbered to LATN 135A.<br /> </b>The department searches for LATN 135 and updates the following fields as illustrated below: </p> 
     <ul style="list-style:disc;"> 
      <li>Course Suffix</li> 
      <li>Renumbered From</li> 
      <li>Closing Notes</li> 
      <li>1st Effective Quarter and Year<br /> <br /> </li> 
     </ul> 
     <p align="center"> <img border="0" alt="" src="../../images/course-mgt/chapter15one.jpg" /></p> 
     <p align="left"> <br /> <br /> <br /> <br /> The department creates LATN 135B as a &quot;new&quot; course and completes the following fields as illustrated below: </p> 
     <ul style="list-style:disc;"> 
      <li>Renumbered From</li> 
      <li>Closing Notes<br /> <br /> </li> 
     </ul> 
     <p align="center"> <img border="0" alt="" src="../../images/course-mgt/chapter15two.jpg" /></p> 
     <p> <br /> </p> 
     <p> <br /> After LATN 135A and LATN 135B are approved, the Registrar's Office updates the following field of LATN 135 as illustrated below: </p> 
     <ul style="list-style:disc;"> 
      <li>Closing Notes <br /> </li> 
     </ul> 
     <p align="center"> <img border="0" alt="" src="../../images/course-mgt/chapter15three.jpg" /></p> 
    </div> 
   </div> 
   <footer class="footerwrapper"> 
    <div class="prefooter"> 
     <div class="container"> 
      <div class="span-7 append-1"> 
       <h3>General Campus Information</h3> 
       <address> <span class="vcard"><strong><span class="fn org">University of California, Riverside</span></strong><br /> <span class="adr"><span class="street-address">900 University Ave.</span><br /> <span class="locality">Riverside</span>, <span class="region">CA</span> <span class="postal-code">92521</span><br /> </span>Tel: <span class="tel">(951) 827-1012</span> </span> </address> 
       <ul class="footer_links"> 
        <li><a href="http://library.ucr.edu/">UCR Libraries</a></li> 
        <li><a href="http://campusstatus.ucr.edu/">Campus Status</a></li> 
        <li><a href="http://www.ucr.edu/employment.html">Career Opportunities</a></li> 
        <li><a href="http://campusstore.ucr.edu/">Campus Store</a></li> 
        <li><a href="http://diversity.ucr.edu/">Diversity</a></li> 
        <li><a href="http://www.ucr.edu/about/directions.html">Maps and Directions</a></li> 
        <li><a href="http://admissions.ucr.edu/VisitUCR">Visit UCR</a></li> 
       </ul> 
      </div> 
      <div class="span-6"> 
       <h3>Department Information</h3> 
       <address> <strong> <span id="lblTitle">The Office of the Registrar - CRAMS</span></strong><br /> <a href="http://www.campusmap.ucr.edu/campusMap.php?loc=SSB" title="Campus Map">Student Services Building Room 2249</a><br /> <br /> Tel: (951) 827-7284<br /> Fax: (951) 827-7368<br /> E-mail: <a href="mailto:reghelpdesk@ucr.edu?subject=Website%20Inquiry">reghelpdesk@ucr.edu</a> </address> 
      </div> 
      <div class="span-10 last seal"> 
       <h3>Related Links</h3> 
       <ul class="relatedLinks" style="padding-left: 0px;"> 
        <li><a href="https://ucribm.ucr.edu/Paws/PAWS.html">Growl</a></li> 
        <li><a href="http://financialaid.ucr.edu/">Financial Aid</a></li> 
        <li><a href="http://www.sbs.ucr.edu/">Student Business Services</a></li> 
        <li><a href="http://www.alumni.ucr.edu/">Alumni</a></li> 
        <li><a href="http://rdream.ucr.edu">R'Dream</a></li> 
       </ul> 
       <p class="footer_info"> <img src="/Images/saBldImage_registrar.jpg" width="120" height="87" alt="Student Serves Building" />The Office of the Registrar delivers accurate, prompt, courteous and consistent services to all students and constituents of UC Riverside. The Registrar takes a leadership role in management of registration, student academic records, course and classroom scheduling, classroom utilization, publications production, and data distribution. </p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div>

   <!-- Start Content (Navigation and Content columns) --> 
   <div id="content"> 
    <h2>Home</h2> 
    <!-- Start Sidebar --> 
    <div id="sidebar"> 
     <div class="nav"> 
      <h3 class="accessibility">Main Navigation</h3> 
      <ul> 
       <li class="currentpage"><h3><dfn>Current page is: </dfn>Home</h3></li>
       <li><a href="/about/" title="About Us">About Us<br /><span></span></a></li>
       <li><a href="/arc.html" title="Academic Resource Center">Academic Resource Center<br /><span></span></a></li>
       <li><a href="/evaluation_assessment.html" title="Evaluation and Assessment">Evaluation and Assessment<br /><span></span></a></li>
       <li><a href="/ocae.html" title="Off Campus Academic Experiences">Off Campus Academic Experiences<br /><span></span></a></li>
       <li><a href="/summer.html" title="Summer Sessions">Summer Sessions<br /><span></span></a></li>
       <li><a href="/teaching.html" title="Teaching and Learning Improvement">Teaching and Learning Improvement<br /><span></span></a></li>
       <li><a href="/research.html" title="Undergraduate Research">Undergraduate Research<br /><span></span></a></li>
       <li><a href="/honors.html" title="University Honors">University Honors<br /><span></span></a></li>
       <li><a href="/uwp.html" title="University Writing Program">University Writing Program<br /><span></span></a></li>
       <li><a href="/contact.html" title="Contact Info">Contact Info<br /><span></span></a></li> 
      </ul> 
     </div> 
     <div> 
      <center>
       <p style="font-size: 13px;"><a class="button" href="https://advancementservices.ucr.edu/GivingForm.aspx?DU=ORG36%20-%20Undergraduate%20Education" target="_blank">Make a Donation &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</a></p>
      </center> 
      <p> <a class="img_link" href="http://thepond.ucr.edu" target="_blank"> <img src="/images/the_pond_img.jpg" alt="The Education Pond Blog" width="220" height="130" /></a> </p> 
     </div> 
     <br /> 
     <!--<div class="spotlight_side"><img style="background-color: #2D6cc0; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px;" src="/images/design6/spotlight_img_top_new.jpg" alt="Spotlight" />
<h6><center><strong>Chancellor's Research Fellows</strong></center></h6>
<div class="contact_info_box">
<h6 class="section2"><img class="img_L" src="/images/crf/my_hua.jpg" alt="Trey Amador" width="64" height="80" /><em><a href="http://ugr.ucr.edu/chancellor_fellowship/recipient_bio/hua_bio.html">My (Crystal) Hua</a></em></h6>
